title: CoinCasso Official
author: CoinCasso Official
content: The undeniable boom of the crypto market during the past 10 years is changing the way we use money and digital currencies. The majority of people have heard about crypto assets but lots of them still struggle to understand what cryptocurrency is and what to do with it. In today’s blog post, we’re cracking up the crypto trends to watch in 2022. We will explain in detail what’s going on in the crypto world and what the latest tendencies are.Read the latest article: https://coincasso.com/blockchain-academy/top-6-cryptocurrency-trends-2022/

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: You should have a least put the trends here instead of us clicking on that link you posted.But in any case it's obviously we are in a bearish trend and so all prices are down. And then we have the NFT's and Metaverse hype still up in the air. And the the merge by Ethereum, XRP recently has a good run when there were speculations that they might win their case against SEC.This is the only thing that is on the top of my heard right now. And sorry, I'm not going on that link.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: You are not really new here, we expect that you should have observed how other Express topics like this by quoting properly and adding the link as a reference. You should have done that or made a summary of the key points from the article.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: the name of this topic is classic clickbait and a poor way to promote your blog.I still clicked on your link, so that I don't comment on something here that I haven't even seen. Your website/blog or whatever is it, by the quality of this article that you shared, is more than below average. You do not offer anything informative, nor any specific view on the topic you assigned. just another trash site, not worth the effort.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: The purpose of the forum is for people to help each other by sharing their knowledge here. But you are detracting from its purpose by putting a link to your own website here. On the forum, we can have discussions by opening various topics and make comments on each other's topics. Why would I want to go to your site and do something like this? When sharing a link to your own website, please make the necessary explanation in the subject. Otherwise, its name is nothing but phishing.

But you are detracting from its purpose by putting a link to your own website here. On the forum, we can have discussions by opening various topics and make comments on each other's topics. Why would I want to go to your site and do something like this? When sharing a link to your own website, please make the necessary explanation in the subject. Otherwise, its name is nothing but phishing.Not only sharing knowledge but dropping each other more, than giving positive things, if you want to see it is in some special threads such as bounty threads, and they also have the same goal of building, but there are some people who even make it being evil from irresponsible persons, in this forum sometimes giving statements must be clear because it is important for us so that we can see and witness the truth..

comments.author: mdzahed134
comments.body: I visited in your article link but i don’t see top 6 crypto those are trending in 2022 as far as your topic, why you are promoting own website? If you will publish informative article then you don’t need to promote such way, you will get more viewers in your site. Best of luck!

OP always offer zero value discussion here except promote his shitty blog for clicks. I have seen several useless posts of his. I don't even bother visiting the links provided. If he continues doing this, I will make a report about it in meta so that he gets banned like all other past users who were just promoting their blogs here.

But you are detracting from its purpose by putting a link to your own website here. On the forum, we can have discussions by opening various topics and make comments on each other's topics. Commenting on bounty is something different. But even for this, at least there are comments that contribute to the forum. At least people are not after this kind of blogging. Because I am in favor of giving the information to be given to everyone in a way that the forum is open to everyone, without intermediaries. Because here we all have to be objective.

comments.author: rugrats
comments.body: Quote from: mdzahed134 on September 29, 2022, 06:28:59 PMI visited in your article link but i don’t see top 6 crypto those are trending in 2022 as far as your topic, why you are promoting own website? If you will publish informative article then you don’t need to promote such way, you will get more viewers in your site. Best of luck!Unfortunately it's a bad ad and he will never succeed with the mentality of taking advantage of people. I also don't click on links like everyone above. If it's possible to report OP's site, I'll report it because it's more of a scam than providing useful information to people here. We are here to share experience and knowledge for mutual development, not a place for him to take advantage of people's trust for his own gain.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: I tried to visit your website @OP but I found this:I do not continue to open your website so I do not know what your website looks like.Besides that, some members said your article does not contain the coin mentioned.Maybe you should fix your website first so that error is not showing up again.You can find the top 6 cryptocurrencies on CoinGecko and check by yourself.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: mdzahed134 on September 29, 2022, 06:28:59 PMI visited in your article link but i don’t see top 6 crypto those are trending in 2022 as far as your topic, why you are promoting own website? If you will publish informative article then you don’t need to promote such way, you will get more viewers in your site. Best of luck!Have you looked at the title of the OP's topic before making a reply? The title of the article posted by the OP is "Top 6 cryptocurrency trends 2022", not "Top 6 cryptocurrency in 2022". Besides that there is nothing wrong with posting the articles they make here, it's part of their marketing that aims to attract more visitors (even if it's not organic).Quote from: traderethereum on September 30, 2022, 05:47:32 AM-snip-I've opened the link provided by the OP, and I'm not having the same problem you are having. Everything looks fine. Maybe the problem occurs only on your side, you can try again mate.

comments.author: judaspriest
comments.body: 2022 is only 3 months left and the market is indeed bearish, so there is nothing that really creates hype in the market, it's just that we have to analyze it so as not to miss the momentum in 2023, there are categories that you have to monitor and maybe you can buy, these categories are from NFTs, Metaverse, Mineable, Privacy, Defi and Media.

comments.author: CoinCasso Official
comments.body: Quote from: traderethereum on September 30, 2022, 05:47:32 AMI tried to visit your website @OP but I found this:https://i.imgur.com/0DbSAgu.pngI do not continue to open your website so I do not know what your website looks like.Besides that, some members said your article does not contain the coin mentioned.Maybe you should fix your website first so that error is not showing up again.You can find the top 6 cryptocurrencies on CoinGecko and check by yourself.Thank you for the information, but on our side and with our other users there are no such problems. Please give more information, or see in incognito browser if you still have such problem.

comments.author: Lantind
comments.body: Quote from: CoinCasso Official on September 28, 2022, 12:02:28 PMThe undeniable boom of the crypto market during the past 10 years is changing the way we use money and digital currencies. The majority of people have heard about crypto assets but lots of them still struggle to understand what cryptocurrency is and what to do with it. In today’s blog post, we’re cracking up the crypto trends to watch in 2022. We will explain in detail what’s going on in the crypto world and what the latest tendencies are.Read the latest article: https://coincasso.com/blockchain-academy/top-6-cryptocurrency-trends-2022/Most people already know about crypto. And this continues to be discussed by word of mouth. Social media, news media and advertisements continue to broadcast crypto. Of course someone's curiosity about crypto makes them will study crypto. However, they have not been able to use it for daily transactions as a substitute for Fiat. Because the usability, or functionality somewhere is still very limited.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: It's most likely those top 6 we've seen already last year. And that means that there's nothing new for this year because we're on the bear market but take a look at next year.I'm sure that there will be emerging new projects that will introduce to a new model of trend and technology and by that, it will open more opportunities again that the first risk takers will benefit.And then, those that will be late on it will be the ones that shall go again with the bear market after it's up and done.

This thread I think is considered spam also. Wanting users to go to the website instead of just putting the list in here. Among the list, it's only NFTs that trend the most because of celebrities' and artists' support. There is Snoop dog as an example of them. The rest already had been discussed in the past like the web3 or ATMs.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on October 05, 2022, 11:59:02 PMI'm sure that there will be emerging new projects that will introduce to a new model of trend and technology and by that, it will open more opportunities again that the first risk takers will benefit.That is natural to happen very soon when the bull will come back the experience will take that advantage again if they grab the opportunity to invest in a new project. That time of the bull new project release into the market, the way for the investment is research and the first risk takers gain or lose. Quote from: jossiel on October 05, 2022, 11:59:02 PMAnd then, those that will be late on it will be the ones that shall go again with the bear market after it's up and done.Those that didn't invest when the time come will be at the losing corner with regret and statement of that kind so to invest is during the bear season.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: gantez on October 06, 2022, 09:49:41 AMQuote from: jossiel on October 05, 2022, 11:59:02 PMI'm sure that there will be emerging new projects that will introduce to a new model of trend and technology and by that, it will open more opportunities again that the first risk takers will benefit.That is natural to happen very soon when the bull will come back the experience will take that advantage again if they grab the opportunity to invest in a new project. That time of the bull new project release into the market, the way for the investment is research and the first risk takers gain or lose. They don't have a guarantee and that's why they're called the first risk takers because they know what they're doing and it's not an assured profit from them. But when they do, it certainly a lot.Quote from: gantez on October 06, 2022, 09:49:41 AMQuote from: jossiel on October 05, 2022, 11:59:02 PMAnd then, those that will be late on it will be the ones that shall go again with the bear market after it's up and done.Those that didn't invest when the time come will be at the losing corner with regret and statement of that kind so to invest is during the bear season.They didn't invest, so there's nothing to lose for them. But those that have invested and too late, they'll be the ones that shall lose because it's the usual market that we've seen every after the bull run.
